children.name: visible
children.description: Gets or sets the visibility of the current element.

children.name: remove
children.description: Removes the given element from the group

children.name: reflow
children.description: Arranges the elements based on the current options.

children.name: rect
children.description: Gets or sets the layout rectangle.

children.name: clear
children.description: Removes all elements from the group.

children.name: append
children.description: Appends the given element to the group

children.name: wrap
children.description: Specifies the behavior when the elements size exceeds the rectangle size. If set to true, the elements will be moved to the next "line". If set to false, the layout will be scaled so that the elements fit in the rectangle.

children.name: orientation
children.description: Specifies the layout orientation. The supported values are:* "horizontal" - the elements are arranged horizontally* "vertical" - the elements are arranged vertically

children.name: spacing
children.description: Specifies the distance between the elements.

children.name: lineSpacing
children.description: Specifies the distance between the lines for wrapped layout.

children.name: justifyContent
children.description: Specifies how should the content be justified.

children.name: alignItems
children.description: Specifies the alignment of the items based on each other.

children.name: alignContent
children.description: Specifies the alignment of the content.
